article_title: A Word from Dr. Pfenninger: USPSTF screening recommendations, Part 1 of 2
article_text:
Midland, MI (48640)

Today

Scattered thunderstorms during the morning becoming more widespread this afternoon. High near 85F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Thunderstorms this evening, then skies turning partly cloudy after midnight. Low 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.author:
Dr. John L. Pfenninger
for the Daily News

og.description: In many past columns, I have quoted the health screening recommendations of the United States Preventive Services Task Force (USPSTF). This is a group that reviews all the literature research
